ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only certain roles can be specified as primary group
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
FinServ__PrimaryGroup__c = true
&&
NOT(INCLUDES( Roles, "Client") || INCLUDES( Roles, "Child") || INCLUDES( Roles, "Deceased Client"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Primary group can only be true where the role is client, child or deceased client.
